headline: Boots’ biggest problem might just be its billionaire owner
summary: Stefano Pessina loves a good deal. Over the years, the Italian billionaire has struck more than a thousand of them to create global pharmacy juggernaut Walgreens Boots Alliance (WBA), which owns the British chemist Boots. In his lauded career, Pessina has garnered a reputation for ruthlessness.
